metadata.description: Authorship claimed by Jacques-René Hébert; sometimes ascribed to Restif de La Bretonne. Cf. Tourneaux, IV, 23997

Imprints vary. Nos. 2-5: Rue Gît-le-Cœur, hôtel S. Louis, no. 4, et chez les marchands de nouveautés; de l'imprimerie de Laurens junior, libraire, rue Saint-Jacques, vis-à-vis celle des Mathurins, no. 37. Nos. 6-10: De l'imprimerie de J. Grand, rue du Foin-S. Jacques, no 6
Tourneux, M. Paris pendant la Révolution française
Forms part of the French Revolution Collection at the Newberry Library
metadata.notes: No copyright page found. No table-of-contents pages found. Damaged, stained pages and cover. Title on cover.
